resources.string: Your diet(s)
Diet name
Warning
Your diet(s) data stays on your device. Nothing will be uploaded anywhere.
Name
Description
Enabled/Disabled
Authorized ingredients
List the authorized ingredients that should appear in green. Example : apple, mushroom, tomato… You can complete this list later.
So so ingredients
List the problematic ingredients that should appear in orange. Example : egg, fish… You can complete this list later.
Unauthorized ingredients
List the unauthorized ingredients that should appear in red. Example : gluten, milk, palm oil, sugar... You can complete this list later.
To have this new diet in Open Food Facts, thanks to open OFF App, goto to menu
Click on the Add a diet button\nThen copy/paste theses informations in the corresponding fields :
Click on
Add a diet
An explicit name for your diet is required
Please enter an explicit name for your diet !
A optionaly description of for your diet
However, for a better experience, you will automatically download the ingredients taxonomy when you\'ll add your first diet.
So please, be sure you are online before your first click on the \"Add a diet\" button !
Now you have created a diet you can see its effects by scanning a product (a traffic light appear in case of problem) and consult its ingredients.
You may click on this ingredients list to complete your diet.
You may also add some other diets and enabled/disabled them.
Remove this diet.
Remove
Do you want to remove the diet and all its relations?
Initial ingredients loading
